<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SegmentWriter.getLength() == 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SegmentInjection &#42;FLI =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (RecordKind == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a856d291d3b47f25806d62863137976a2aa1017051aa12b8176e548f2752a73693">ContinuationRecordKind::FieldList</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ? &amp;<a href="#a5bd699f2ab309af4b02699179c5aac56">InjectFieldList</a></span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;FLIB = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint8&#95;t &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(FLI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  InjectedSegmentBytes =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a>(FLIB, FLIB + </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(SegmentInjection));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Seed the first record with an appropriate record prefix.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/recordprefix">RecordPrefix</a> Prefix(<a href="#a217901fe9457c329df145c2532371d72">getTypeLeafKind</a>(RecordKind));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a238eda31f74c0f0f3224f71b50b7d165">CVType</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a>(&amp;Prefix, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Prefix));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1e1474f15df639f0d874b21f15666f7">cantFail</a>(Mapping.visitTypeBegin(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1e1474f15df639f0d874b21f15666f7">cantFail</a>(SegmentWriter.writeObject(Prefix));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RecordType&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/continuationrecordbuilder/#ae34aaae4476c9e3f0c4bbd5626bdd856"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/continuationrecordbuilder/#ae34aaae4476c9e3f0c4bbd5626bdd856">ContinuationRecordBuilder::writeMemberType</a>(RecordType &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Kind);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t OriginalOffset = SegmentWriter.getOffset();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/cvmemberrecord">CVMemberRecord</a> CVMR;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CVMR.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/cvmemberrecord/#a9ed7c83e13705c1e202683c4374c45ad">Kind</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a945d5dcbe78d400d17656726e2f6089b">TypeLeafKind</a></span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a>.getKind());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Member Records aren&#39;t length-prefixed, they only have a 2-byte TypeLeafKind</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at the beginning.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1e1474f15df639f0d874b21f15666f7">cantFail</a>(SegmentWriter.writeEnum(CVMR.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/cvmemberrecord/#a9ed7c83e13705c1e202683c4374c45ad">Kind</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Let the Mapping handle the rest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1e1474f15df639f0d874b21f15666f7">cantFail</a>(Mapping.visitMemberBegin(CVMR));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1e1474f15df639f0d874b21f15666f7">cantFail</a>(Mapping.visitKnownMember(CVMR, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1e1474f15df639f0d874b21f15666f7">cantFail</a>(Mapping.visitMemberEnd(CVMR));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure it&#39;s padded to 4 bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#ae9446f182f86fd8c4dca65264de68235">addPadding</a>(SegmentWriter);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(getCurrentSegmentLength() % 4 == 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The maximum length of a single segment is 64KB minus the size to insert a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// continuation.  So if we are over that, inject a continuation between the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// previous member and the member that was just written, then end the previous</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// segment after the continuation and begin a new one with the just-written</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// member.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (getCurrentSegmentLength() &gt; <a href="#a469414953a3eb21f68469e412b50659f">MaxSegmentLength</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to inject some bytes before the member we just wrote but after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the previous member.  Save off the length of the member we just wrote so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that we can do validate it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t MemberLength = SegmentWriter.getOffset() - OriginalOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    (void) MemberLength;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    insertSegmentEnd(OriginalOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since this member now becomes a new top-level record, it should have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// gotten a RecordPrefix injected, and that RecordPrefix + the member we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// just wrote should now constitute the entirety of the current &quot;new&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// segment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(getCurrentSegmentLength() == MemberLength + </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/recordprefix">RecordPrefix</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(getCurrentSegmentLength() % 4 == 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(getCurrentSegmentLength() &lt;= <a href="#a469414953a3eb21f68469e412b50659f">MaxSegmentLength</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">uint32&#95;t ContinuationRecordBuilder::getCurrentSegmentLength()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SegmentWriter.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#a2d1fbfecba0a643a1db961c9f9313b6e">getOffset</a>() - SegmentOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#acd9e771a3296c6b24146955754620557">back</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t SegmentBegin = SegmentOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#acd9e771a3296c6b24146955754620557">back</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  (void)SegmentBegin;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &gt; SegmentBegin);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> - SegmentBegin &lt;= <a href="#a469414953a3eb21f68469e412b50659f">MaxSegmentLength</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to make space for the continuation record.  For now we can&#39;t fill</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// out the length or the TypeIndex of the back-reference, but we need the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// space to at least be there.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Buffer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/appendingbinarybytestream/#ad444e7dc0b30ff2af7e7e3362287f291">insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, InjectedSegmentBytes);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t NewSegmentBegin = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + <a href="#a1ca9f1e09940d659d6ac2be3761955ff">ContinuationLength</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t SegmentLength = NewSegmentBegin - SegmentOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#acd9e771a3296c6b24146955754620557">back</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  (void) SegmentLength;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SegmentLength % 4 == 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SegmentLength &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a77953260dd85922d9583bf426f89787aa30d8ae376cd42fd999ac8713cf85be2e">MaxRecordLength</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SegmentOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(NewSegmentBegin);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Seek to the end so that we can keep writing against the new segment.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SegmentWriter.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#a396d68393ffbcede5c0d7fd59c16f1c9">bytesRemaining</a>() == 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a238eda31f74c0f0f3224f71b50b7d165">CVType</a> ContinuationRecordBuilder::createSegmentRecord(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t OffBegin, uint32&#95;t OffEnd, std::optional&lt;TypeIndex&gt; RefersTo) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(OffEnd - OffBegin &lt;= USHRT&#95;MAX);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a> = Buffer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/appendingbinarybytestream/#ab80f357bc9e2e1f997bfc489cbb63819">data</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.slice(OffBegin, OffEnd - OffBegin);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Write the length to the RecordPrefix, making sure it does not include</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sizeof(RecordPrefix.Length)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/recordprefix">RecordPrefix</a> &#42;Prefix = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/recordprefix">RecordPrefix</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.data());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Prefix-&gt;RecordLen = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.size() - </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/recordprefix/#afdb0f5c60aa51c3ac0d3cad028e17e8e">RecordPrefix::RecordLen</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RefersTo) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Continuation = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.take&#95;back(<a href="#a1ca9f1e09940d659d6ac2be3761955ff">ContinuationLength</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ContinuationRecord &#42;CR =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">ContinuationRecord &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Continuation.data());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CR-&gt;Kind == TypeLeafKind::LF&#95;INDEX);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CR-&gt;IndexRef == 0xB0C0B0C0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CR-&gt;IndexRef = RefersTo-&gt;getIndex();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a238eda31f74c0f0f3224f71b50b7d165">CVType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/continuationrecordbuilder/#a315b005fd28fb91606126f127019a376"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::vector&lt;CVType&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/continuationrecordbuilder/#a315b005fd28fb91606126f127019a376">ContinuationRecordBuilder::end</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/typeindex">TypeIndex</a> Index) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/recordprefix">RecordPrefix</a> Prefix(<a href="#a217901fe9457c329df145c2532371d72">getTypeLeafKind</a>(&#42;Kind));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a238eda31f74c0f0f3224f71b50b7d165">CVType</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a>(&amp;Prefix, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Prefix));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1e1474f15df639f0d874b21f15666f7">cantFail</a>(Mapping.visitTypeEnd(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;re now done, and we have a series of segments each beginning at an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offset specified in the SegmentOffsets array.  We now need to iterate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// over each segment and post-process them in the following two ways:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) Each top-level record has a RecordPrefix whose type is either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    LF&#95;FIELDLIST or LF&#95;METHODLIST, but the Length field is still 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Those should all be set to the correct length now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) Each continuation record has an IndexRef field which we set to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    magic value 0xB0C0B0C0.  Now that the caller has told us the TypeIndex</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    they want this sequence to start from, we can go through and update</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    each one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Logically, the sequence of records we&#39;ve built up looks like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;0&#93;:   &lt;Length&gt;                    (Initially: uninitialized)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;0&#93;+2: LF&#95;FIELDLIST</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;0&#93;+4: Member&#91;0&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;0&#93;+?: ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;0&#93;+?: Member&#91;4&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;-8: LF&#95;INDEX</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;-6: 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;-4: &lt;Type Index of Next Record&gt; (Initially: 0xB0C0B0C0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;:   &lt;Length&gt;                    (Initially: uninitialized)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;+2: LF&#95;FIELDLIST</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;+4: Member&#91;0&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;+?: ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;+?: Member&#91;s&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;2&#93;-8: LF&#95;INDEX</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;2&#93;-6: 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;2&#93;-4: &lt;Type Index of Next Record&gt; (Initially: 0xB0C0B0C0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;N&#93;:   &lt;Length&gt;                    (Initially: uninitialized)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;N&#93;+2: LF&#95;FIELDLIST</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;N&#93;+4: Member&#91;0&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;N&#93;+?: ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;N&#93;+?: Member&#91;t&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And this is the way we have laid them out in the serialization buffer.  But</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we cannot actually commit them to the underlying stream this way, due to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the topological sorting requirement of a type stream (specifically,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TypeIndex references can only point backwards, not forwards).  So the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sequence that we return to the caller contains the records in reverse</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order, which is the proper order for committing the serialized records.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;CVType&gt; Types;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Types.reserve(SegmentOffsets.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a> SO = SegmentOffsets;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t End = SegmentWriter.getOffset();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;TypeIndex&gt; RefersTo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(SO)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Types.push&#95;back(createSegmentRecord(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, End, RefersTo));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    End = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RefersTo = Index++;</span></CodeLine>
